basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2028.

work.summary: Student IT worker at the Windward Community College
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee our loaner laptops, and assist students with tech-related issues
Assist in the administration of computerized placement tests (Accuplacer), online and paper-based University of Hawaii (UH) system and non-UH system distance education tests, and WCC campus tests.
Maintain security of the Testing Center, including the testing room and instructorsâ€™ test files and codes.

awards.title: Certificate of Competence in Cyber Security
